code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useParams,Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useCookies}from"react-cookie";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function FakestoreProducts(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([{id:0,title:"",image:"",price:0,category:"",description:"",rating:{rate:0,count:0}}]);const[cookies,setCookie,removeCookie]=useCookies(['username']);let navigate=useNavigate();let params=useParams();useEffect(()=>{if(cookies["username"]){axios.get("https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/".concat(params.category)).then(response=>{setProducts(response.data);});}else{navigate('/login');}},[params.category]);function handleSignoutClick(){removeCookie('username');navigate('/login');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container my-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"h3",children:["Hello! ",cookies["username"]]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleSignoutClick,children:"Signout"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"text-center",children:[params.category.toUpperCase()," PRODUCTS"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"row justify-content-center",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-6 col-md-4 col-lg-3 mb-4 d-flex flex-column align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.title,className:"img-fluid mb-2",style:{height:'150px',objectFit:'contain'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/details/".concat(product.id),className:"btn btn-primary w-100",children:"Details"})})]},product.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mt-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/categories",className:"btn btn-outline-secondary",children:"Back to Categories"})})]});}
